scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run auth:dev" "npm run user:dev" "npm run bank:dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run auth:prod" "npm run user:prod" "npm run bank:prod"
scripts.docker:build:images: concurrently "docker build --tag auth ./auth" "docker build --tag user ./user" "docker build --tag bank ./bank"
scripts.docker:run:containers: concurrently "docker run --name auth -p 3001:3001 auth" "docker run --name user -p 3002:3002 user" "docker run --name bank -p 3003:3003 bank"
